title: JSONSchema description of Package schema.json files
description: Specify how Packages are defined in JSON

page_type.description: Define a page associated with node or package configuration

label.description: Define the label on the button or menu item which opens this client

title.description: Defines a title for this client, displayed in various places in the user interface

url.description: Defines a relative path to the HTML file which displays this client

window_width.description: Defines the default window width, when this client is first opened

window_height.description: Defines the default window height, when this client is first opened

id.description: Provide a unique id for this package

configuration.description: Provide details of the package configuration

pages.description: Define clients of this package's configuration - specify a mapping from client name to its definition

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name of this package

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this package

version.description: Specify the version of the package

l10n.description: mapping from a node type id to its definition

languages.description: mapping from a language identifier to localisation bundle

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this link type

bundle_url.description: Provide a relative path to the JSON bundle file for this language

default_language.description: specify which language this package should use by default

node_types.description: mapping from a node type id to its definition

.*.description: Specify how Node Types are defined in JSON

metadata.description: Attach metadata to this node type

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this node type

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this node type

corners.description: Specify the number of corners to display on this node's outline.  If <2, draw a round outline

icon.description: provide the relative path to an icon file (SVG is recommended)

pages.description: Define pages associated with this node - specify a mapping from client name to its definition

input_ports.description: Specify a mapping from an input port name to its definition

metadata.description: Attach metadata to this input port

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this port

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this port

link_type.description: the link type of the port, qualified with the package name

allow_multiple_connections.description: whether this port allows more than one connection to other ports, defaults to false

output_ports.description: Specify a mapping from an output port name to its definition

metadata.description: Attach metadata to this output port

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this port

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this port

link_type.description: the link type of the port, qualified with the package name

allow_multiple_connections.description: whether this port allows more than one connection to other ports, defaults to false

link_types.description: mapping from a link type id to its definition

.*.description: Specify how Link Types are defined in JSON

metadata.description: Attach metadata to this link type

name.description: Provide a short descriptive name for this link type

description.description: Provide a short description (~1 paragraph) of the purpose of this link type

colour.description: Specify a colour for this link type, used when drawing networks as a diagram
